Hi Bonnie,

Confirming we’ve updated the site’s header and footer.

We also noticed that the “Brands” link in the footer has been removed—just wanted to check if that was intentional or if you’d like us to add it back in.

Thanks Joel. Can you please make the below changes
  • add Sales Support from the footer into the header under 'About Us'
  • move 'Privacy Policy' and 'Modern Slavery Policy & Statement' to the footer, and remove from the drop-down menu in the header

Hi Bonnie,

Great to hear, thanks for the update!

It’s exciting to be getting so close to launch. Here’s the 2nd batch of DNS records to point the domain to the new website:

A Record
  • Name/Host: @
  • IP Address: 162.159.134.42
CNAME Record
  • Name/Host: www
  • Points to: mayohardware.com.au

Let me know once that’s all set up, happy to help if you need anything!

Hi Bonnie,

Happy Friday! Hope you’re having a lovely end to the week.

Here is the update on the latest changes we’ve made:
  • About Us dropdown has been updated to include (Let us know if there are other pages that we need to add under about us):
    • History
    • Mission
    • Logistics
    • Privacy Policy
    • Modern Slavery Policy Statement
  • Footer links have been refreshed:
    • Under Quicklinks: Catalogues, Health & Safety Data Sheets
    • Under Copyright: Privacy Policy, Modern Slavery Policy Statement
  • New pages created:
    • Catalogues
    • Health & Safety Data Sheets
    • Modern Slavery Policy Statement
  • Sales Support section is now fully mobile responsive
  • Brands page now includes all available links from the spreadsheet

Thanks so much for adding your comments on the redirects, those will be sorted once the site goes live!

Also, just let us know when you're ready and we can send through the 2nd batch of DNS records.

Let me know if you have any questions or if there’s anything else you’d like us to tweak.

Hi Andy,

Please also ensure the links in the footer are added as per my notes in the redirect spreadsheet.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager

We're working on the final updates now, including the dropdown menu under "About Us" - that's currently being reviewed.

Assuming everything checks out in testing, we're aiming to go live tomorrow afternoon at 3pm AEST.

Andy
